title: 過期情人
author: 喜糖糖
description:
十八線糊咖夏桑以為自己和大佬是和平分手，沒想到這狗東西不撒嘴了，他還要二次、三次上崗！
1
夏桑合同到期被大佬炒鱿魚後，在外陪經紀人應酬都能吃成自助餐，把經紀人氣死。
“能不能為了你這張帥臉争氣點！”
夏桑看了看自己貧瘠的錢包和通告，還是面前的餅比較實在。
本來以為只能靠自己雙手發家致富的時候，前老板又重新發了offer。
梁爺：回來。
夏桑：有佛跳牆、清湯燕菜、黃焖魚翅、紅燒鮑魚、灌湯黃魚、三套鴨…嗎？
梁爺：…
夏桑：沒有，就不要打擾我幹盒飯。
2
梁亦銘最痛恨的就是自己的病，每次皮膚饑渴症發作，他都忍不住厭惡，卻沒辦法治愈。
只有夏桑能讓他稍微好受點，但沒想到這小玩意一分手就不聽話了。
梁爺：夏桑那邊怎麽樣了
助理：打壓了夏先生三個代言了。
梁爺：他後悔了嗎？
助理：沒有，他去拍擦邊短視頻，現在點贊百萬了。
梁爺：…
-
窮逼糊咖樂觀受Ⅹ有病嘴硬大佬攻
-
1.梁爺非C，夏夏C。
2.廁所讀物，只博大家一笑。大家喜歡多看看，不喜歡，CP還有超多厲害的太太！好文！祝大家今天能找到一本好看的文??(?ˉ???ˉ???)?”

description_translated:
Xia Sang, an obscure actress, thought she and her boss had a peaceful breakup, but little did she expect that this bastard wouldn't let go, and he wanted to return to the job a second and third time!
1
After Xia Sang's contract expired and she was fired by her boss, she ended up eating buffets while entertaining her manager, infuriating her manager.
"Can't you be a little more assertive for the sake of your handsome face!"
Xia Sang looked at her meager wallet and limited work schedule, and realized that the pie in front of her was more tangible.
Just when she thought she could only make a fortune through her own hard work, her former boss offered her a new job.
Master Liang: Come back.
Xia Sang: Do you have Buddha Jumps Over the Wall, clear broth bird's nest, braised shark fin, braised abalone, yellow croaker in broth, three-course duck...?
Liang Ye: …
Xia Sang: No, don't bother me while I'm eating.
2
Liang Yiming hates his illness the most. Every time his skin thirst flares up, he can't help but feel disgusted, but he can't cure it.
Only Xia Sang can make him feel a little better, but he didn't expect this little thing to become disobedient after the breakup.
Liang Ye: How's Xia Sang doing?
Assistant: She's suppressed three of Mr. Xia's endorsements.
Liang Ye: Did he regret it?
Assistant: No, he went to shoot some borderline short videos, and now he has millions of likes.
Liang Ye: …
